page.title: 17 Junior and Senior Clubs.
page.content: In the area surrounding St.Cleer there are various organisations and clubs both for adults and children.The {Youth Club}meet in the Memorial Hall on Monday evenings, when they play snooker,soft tennis,darts and other games.The same hall is used on three occasions for badminton. On Wednesdays the{Cubs}meet in the Memorial Hall on Wednesdays, the{Brownies}in St. Agatha's Hall and the{Guides}in the County Primary School. On Friday evenings the{Scouts}meet in St. Agatha's Hall. For{adults,}the Liberal Hall is used for snooker on most evenings. On Fridays, badminton is played in the Memorial Hall. The{W.I.}meets monthly at St. Agatha's.The{Over 60s Club}meet in the Memorial Hall.The{Young Mothers and{Keep Fit Club}share St.Agatha's Hall on Tuesday evenings.
